amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to be used to carry out section 801 of the Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007, which creates a national media campaign to promote alternative green technologies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to carry out section 801 of the Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Landry amendment (A053) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A053) offered by Mr. Landry.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Landry amendment (A053) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
